formatted_address: 38 Irrawaddy Road, Mt E Novena Specialist Center #06-35, Singapore 329563
name: Desmond Wai Liver & Gastrointestinal Diseases Centre

reviews.text:
My son recently had severe non stop vomiting and diarrhoea in the middle of the night and we rushed him to the A&E of Mt E Novena.

Thanks to the prompt care he received at the A&E, he was promptly treated for the vomiting before being warded.

Dr Desmond Wai so happened to be the Gastro on call that night and it served us well since he also happened to be the panel doctor of our Insurance Company.

The A&E nurse told us that Dr would see us in the room at 5am.  It was almost 4am by the time we got to the room.

And true to his words, Dr arrived at 4.55am and from the first moment, I was very sure my son would be in good hands.

Over the next few days, Dr proved to be a great doctor who knew exactly what the problem was and thanks to his great care and concern, my son recovered well and was discharged two days later.

Thank you Dr Wai for your professionalism and care shown to my son.  We were indeed very fortunate that you were the gastro on call that night.

Staff and doctor are really friendly and accommodating. Dr Desmond Wai is really insightful about tips to manage different medical issues and his staff are patient people that are committed to serving their patients.

The clinic can get filled up pretty fast, so try to avoid bringing anyone who does not need the consultation.

I truly appreciated Dr Wai took time to listen to my concerns & diagnosed my gastritis with accurate treatment. Also, thanks to his nurses regularly checking on me which was very reassuring. And, also thanks to Chris for always welcoming and prompt in assisting with appointments & follow-ups.

Dr Wai's clinic is a very busy one, but despite that - you would receive the full focus and very efficient advices to patients. He would make sure you receive the best care and committed to checking on his patients when hospitalized. The nurses are very helpful and very strategic to find convenient approaches to help their patients when proceeding with other medical check ups and laps. I wish Dr Wai's Clinic the best for 2024 and years to come.

I was glad to be referred to Dr Desmond Wai as he is a very patient, knowledgeable and professional doctor. He was detailed in his diagnosis and explained in layman terms which made things easier to digest. His clinic assistant Chris is the best as she was always very helpful and responsive. She coordinated well and promptly with the hospital arrangements and appointments. As a patient, I knew I was in good hands with this caring team.  Thank you, Doctor Wai and Chris!

vicinity: 38 Irrawaddy Road, Mt E Novena Specialist Center #06-35
